# Security Policy

## Supported Versions


| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.4.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 0.3.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 0.0.3   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you find a vulnerability in Ã–bEngine, please fill an issue explaining it.
